text: Loves of a Blondie (), also known as A Blonde in Love, is a 1965 Czech romantic black comedy-drama movie directed by Miloš Forman and starring Hana Brejchová, Vladimír Pucholt, Vladimír Menšík, Ivan Kheil, Jiří Hrubý. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1966. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1965 romantic comedy movies Category:1965 romantic drama movies Category:1965 comedy-drama movies Category:1960s black comedy movies Category:Czech romance movies Category:Czech comedy movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:Movies directed by Miloš Forman
title: Loves of a Blonde
